name.baseName: Painting ; Coated parts ; Biomass ; Biomass industrial kiln ; All sizes; NESPS2
涂装 ; 涂装件 ; 生物质 ; 生物质工业炉窑 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisLimestone/gypsum method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisLimestone/gypsum method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了在各种规模的生物质工业炉窑的涂装工艺中，用于氮氧化物（NOx）、颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）和二氧化硫（SO2）污染控制的各种尾气处理技术的使用和技术效率。技术包括选择性催化还原（SCR）、烟气循环燃烧法、低NOx燃烧法、选择性非催化还原（SNCR）、氧化/吸收法、直接排放、袋式过滤器、板式静电除尘器、管式过滤、文氏管、喷雾塔/水冲击浴、多管旋风除尘器、单筒旋风（多筒并联）、以及几种烟气脱硫方法如石灰/石膏法、石灰石/石膏法和双碱法等。这些技术适用于使用生物质作为燃料并涂装生产过程中排放气体的污染控制，并且可以在不同规模的操作中使用。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码33-37文件，在完整版文件中第1017页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性催化还原法（SCR），其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisFlue gas cycle combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是烟气循环燃烧，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisLow NOx combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是低氮燃烧法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisOxidation/absorption method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是氧化/吸收法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSNCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性非催化还原法（SNCR），其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
nan
源文件中描述为为生物质，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW).The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 17S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 17S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDouble alkali process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW).The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 17S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 17S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
